name: Margot De Cotesworth
what_you_do: I am an author, speaker, coach, clinical hypnotherapist and radio show host.
who_you_serve: My clients are only interested in getting results, and achieving that is my forté.
social_proof: I have published books on life and relationships. My forthcoming book _You are the Genie_ will be a game-changer.
signature_programs: My signature talk: Tell a different story - how our self-perception dictates our success, Perfect Health
business_focus: Margôt de Cotesworth is a motivational speaker who shows people how to change their life from the inside out.
